long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Import any piece of content from any blog to TypeStack in just one step. 
TypeStack is a no-code blogging tool that helps you to publish your blog/content to your website without any hassles of hosting, maintenance, and optimizations.

TypeStack has everything to help you write and grow your blog. Visit our website (https://typestack.ai/) to know more about us. With TypeStack your blog will consistently score 90+ in Google LightHouse score and this helps with your blog ranking significantly. TypeStack takes care of complete on-page technical SEO such as scheme, sitemap, robots, and many others. Just focus on creating content and we will take care of the rest and help you convert your content into organic traffic.

Features of this Extension: 
Title and Description of the post 
When you decide to import an entire blog, title and description are auto filled for a smoother experience.

Import partial content from any web page
You can highlight a selected content on any web page and import it to TypeStack’s editor.

Edit the blog on TypeStack’s Editor
Use advanced features of our editor to make your blog more informative and enlightening.

View performance score of the post
Once you publish your post, you can check the performance score of the post.

If you have any issue regarding this tool, contact us via 
Email : support@typestack.ai
